DOC.criteria: Patients newly diagnose stage IIV breast cancer ( tumor size 2cm image examination ) schedule start systemic therapy . Patients must histological diagnosis invasive breast cancer . Extent disease determine physical examination conventional radiological study . Must age 18 older . ECOG performance status 02 . Patients history prior malignancy must diseasefree least 5 year study entry . Normal hematological function : WBC > 3000/ul , absolute neutrophil count > 1500/ul , platelet > 100,000/ul , Hgb > 10 gm ( transfusion achieve Hgb > 10 gm acceptable ) . Serum total bilirubin < 1.5 mg/dl SGPT < 1.5 X normal . Adequate kidney function ( creatinine < 1.5 mg/dL ) . Patients receive previous chemotherapy newly diagnose breast cancer . No evidence primary breast lesion ( e.g . T0 , Tx ) . Pregnant woman sexually active woman childbearing potential practicing adequate contraception exclude . Patients myocardial infarction within 6 month study entry ; unstable angina pectoris ; uncontrolled congestive heart failure ; uncontrolled arrhythmia exclude . Patients history hypersensitivity/allergy Chitosan/Chitin related shellfish food .
